frame.name: Relational_location
frame.definition: <def-root>This is a general frame that identifies a <fen>Profiled_region</fen> whose configuration is specified by an image schema (specified in more specific child frames) and located relative to a <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Profiled_region
FE.definition: <def-root>The region which is located relative to the Ground and which is shaped according to an image schema.</def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition: <def-root>A place that a <fen>Profiled_region</fen> is located with respect to.</def-root>

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>Indicates the action (or causer) which brings the features of the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> about. This FE should also include words that indicate that there was no salient formation. </def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> is a part of.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The Descriptor is a temporary condition of the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Related_event
FE.definition: <def-root>An event related to the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> in some way other than (1) Formational_cause (which is a separate FE) or an intended use (which would place the instance in Locale_by_use), or (3) a defining event (which would place the instance in Locale_by_event).</def-root>

FE.name: Inherent_purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The activity that is carried out in the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Ground
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity whose location is relatively well-known and which, thus, can serve as a land-mark to identify the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.</def-root>
